title: Find the Period
text: For the standard cotangent function $$f(x)=\operatorname{Acot}\left(Bx-C\right)+D$$, the period is $$\frac{\pi}{|B|}$$. So $$T=\frac{\pi}{\frac{\pi}{8}}=8$$.

title: Find the Horizontal Shift
text: For the standard cotangent function $$f(x)=\operatorname{Acot}\left(Bx-C\right)+D$$, the phase shift is $$\frac{C}{B}$$. So $$h=\frac{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\frac{\pi}{8}}=4$$

title: Find the Vertical Shift
text: For the standard cotangent function $$f(x)=\operatorname{Asec}\left(Bx-C\right)+D$$, the vertical shift is D. So vertical shift is $$-2$$.
